description: A clean, fast meme library app that lets users save, organize, caption, and share memes with a polished UI and subscription-gated power features
target_user: Meme enthusiasts, social media content creators, and digital asset collectors who need efficient meme organization
core_loop: Save meme from camera roll, screenshot, or import
Auto-tag with AI or add custom tags/captions
Browse organized library with search and filtering
Share individual memes or curated collections
Discover trending memes from integrated feeds
subscription_fit: Premium: unlimited storage, AI auto-tagging, advanced search, custom organization, high-quality exports, priority support
